I wish those hadn't gone out of fashion in the aughts, because they're soooo cute.

I don't normally write reviews but in this case I felt like I had to. I washed this shirt and then dried it on medium. It does say low dry but that's normally so the item doesn't shrink, but I needed clothes for work and was in a hurry. When I took the clothes out of the dryer I noticed the shirt had a stain on the bottom. Weird, but whatever. Then I saw that the left sleeve was charred and practically burnt off. I was lucky it didn't start a fire. I should've dried on low heat, sure, but a piece of clothing shouldn't *burn* if it's slightly hotter. It's unsafe and I wanted to warn anyone else thinking of getting this. Maybe it's a one off and just mine, but just in case.
